summary: Completed comprehensive testing of invoicing app with GST functionality. All core features working perfectly including invoice creation, GST calculation (only on service charges), invoice listing, deletion, and navigation.
passed_tests: Invoice creation with correct GST calculation (18% on service charges only)
Real-time calculation display matching backend calculations
Navigation between invoice list and create invoice pages
Line items addition and removal functionality
Customer details form filling and validation
Service charges with GST rate configuration
Frontend-backend integration for all CRUD operations

success_percentage.gst_calculation: 100% (Core requirement: GST only on service charges verified)

action_item_for_E1: No action items required. The invoicing app is fully functional and meets all requirements. The core GST calculation requirement (GST only on service charges, not on line items) is working perfectly.
